name: rubber floor
short_description:
WARCO is a German company which sells and manufactures high-quality rubber floor tiles. They have numerous applications because of their extra durability and fall protection properties. We specialize in terrace tiles, safety flooring, stable mats and interlocking pavers, as well as elastic edging elements and accessories.

Thanks to this unusual combination of properties, rubber floor tiles have become increasingly popular not only in industry, playgrounds and sports fields, but first of all in private properties as a comfortable, weather-resistant balcony flooring and terrace tiles. It is also preferred by horse-owners as elastic stable mats insulate and protect horse's joints.
